participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Passionate and detail-oriented, Michael enjoys hands-on projects and has a nostalgic appreciation for classic cars.
participant_1.background: I like the feeling of being in shape and being able to do well in races. my favorite thing to do is watch old movies. i still have a photo from my senior prom in my wallet. i make cars for a living. I enjoy driving my classic car along the winding roads near my lake house.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Reflective and caring, David is devoted to his family and expresses his creativity through writing.
participant_2.background: I work as a waiter and try my best to be a good father. My most valued material possession is the notebook I keep my short stories in. I think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs as I walk. i also enjoy reading novels by female authors and exploring new areas. i graduated from princeton.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you! What about you?
I'm doing well, too! I'm just enjoying a quiet afternoon at home.
That sounds nice! I'm currently working on a project at home.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to build a car.
It's a lot of work, but it's also a lot of fun.
I bet! What kind of car are you making?
I'm making a classic muscle car.
Oh, that sounds cool! I love classic muscle cars.
Me too! I'm hoping to finish it by the end of the summer.
That would be awesome! I'd love to see it when it's done.
Sure, I'll send you a picture.
